titles.title: To amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to revise the shareholder threshold for registration under such Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by the Yeas and Nays: 34 - 26.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Financial Services. H. Rept. 115-888.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 686.
